Class Node

java.lang.Object
algochoochoo.graph.Node
public class Node extends Object
(Literally) A graph node

      Set a new best path to get to the stop
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the path
      time - The time at the end of the path
      edge - The last edge in the path
